content: join miranda of crazy4crochetmomma and furls crochet for their september 2020 crochet-a-long this month we are making the ridgeway sweater this design features a beautiful off the shoulder neckline and great texture see schedule and details below this sweater is called the ridgeway sweater because of its ridging and texturized design i ve wanted to design a quick and easy off the shoulder sweater for a long time so when furls crochet contacted me i knew this was the most opportune time i hope you all enjoy this pattern as much as i have designing it **about our designer** hi my name is miranda of crazy4crochetmomma and i have been crocheting since i was 10 years old taught by my grandmother because i was eager to learn i got back into it when wanted to make beautiful creations for my first born if you ve been on any of my social media platforms you will notice that i am a big color fan i can t help but share all the colors they truly brighten one s mood **supplies yarn** super bulky yarn 360 420 500 560 600 yards sample uses bernat chunky super bulky weight 6 in linen **other materials** - p/10 mm hook - scissors - large eye tapestry needle **pattern details sizes** s m l xl xxl **measurements** - small 32 - medium 36 - large 40 - xl 44 - xxl 48 **gauge** with 10 mm hook and super bulky yarn row 1 chain 9 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and each chain across chain 1 turn 8 row 2-8 single_crochet in each st across your swatch should measure 4 x 4 **crochet terms** chain- chain chain 1- chain one single_crochet- single_crochet bl- back loop rs- right side half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet hdc3rdloop- half_double_crochet 3rd loop fphdc- front post half_double_crochet bphdc- back post half_double_crochet slip_stitch- slip_stitch fo- fasten_off **part one** coming tuesday september 15 2020 **part two** coming tuesday september 22 2020
